sentences: See maa on meist võrdlemisi kaugel.
context: The Estonian word 'kaugel' is an adverb that means 'far away' or at a distance. It describes something located physically far from the speaker's location or point of reference. The comparative form is 'kaugemal'. In addition to physical distance, it can also refer to temporal distance (far in time) or metaphorical distance (far from certain conditions or states).
